alert.note: Alert for Highlands; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 3:20PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Highlands and southeastern Polk Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 320 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bartow to 7 miles south of Lake Wales to Avon Park. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Winter Haven, Haines City, Bartow, Lake Wales, Auburndale, Avon Park, Jan Phyl Village, Poinciana, Lake Alfred, Crooked Lake Park, Dundee, Frostproof, Davenport, Eagle Lake, Lake Hamilton, Hillcrest Heights, Highland Park, Alturas, Indian Lake Estates and Winter Haven Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
